summary: Instagram-like social media app with chat, stories, reels, follow system, and user account creation
architectural_notes: Mobile app targeting Play Store deployment
Social media platform with user-generated content
Requires backend infrastructure for user data, media storage, and real-time messaging
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern gradient app logo icon with overlapping circles or camera motif in coral and teal tones (app-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Default profile picture placeholder with neutral avatar silhouette on soft gradient background (default-avatar.dim_200x200.png)
- Empty state illustration for when user has no posts yet, minimalist line art style (no-posts-placeholder.dim_400x300.png)

existing_features.title: Implement user account creation and authentication system with Internet Identity integration allowing users to create unique profiles with username, profile picture, and bio
Create a real-time chat messaging system enabling users to send and receive text messages with other users in private one-on-one conversations
Implement a stories feature allowing users to post temporary photo content that expires after 24 hours and is viewable by their followers
Create a reels feature for users to post and view short-form video content with a vertical scrolling feed interface
Build a follow/unfollow system allowing users to follow and unfollow other users, with follower and following counts displayed on profiles
Design a vibrant, modern social media interface with engaging colors and clean typography that creates a welcoming, energetic atmosphere suitable for a content-sharing platform
Create a home feed displaying posts, reels, and stories from followed users in a scrollable timeline with navigation to other sections like chat, profile, and explore
Render placeholder profile pictures and app branding assets as static frontend assets

new_feature_requests.summary: User account creation and authentication system
Stories feature for posting temporary content
Reels feature for short video content
